entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
